title: Havdalah set
text: This Havdalah set includes a covered wine cup, candleholder, and spice container, all items necessary for the ceremony to end Shabbat on Saturday evenings.The sleek, silver forms fit together like a puzzle when stored on the accompanying tray.
description: set has a Kiddush cup with cover, spice container and a candle holder all set into a wood base topped with silver outlined tray for specific pieces; highly polished without any decoration; spice container with oval-like base with one rounded side and two straight sides, leading to angled and rounded top with holes in V shape; candleholder has an oval-like base with two straight sides leading to concave top with candle insert; Kiddush cup has same oval-like base with two straight sides leading to a rounded support for a half-round, half straight, cup with unique cover, having a hole for lifting; all flat sides fit together in silver tray
creditline: The Eloise and Elliot Kaplan Endowment for Judaica
